Lease Draft #4 (final) - Church's Chicke.renewal_options: 2 option(s) to renew for 5 year term(s)
Lease Draft #4 (final) - Church's Chicke.permitted_use: Operating a sit down, delivery and take out style fried chicken restaurant for the sale of a variety of chicken products as primary menu items, and as ancillary items, fries, biscuits, carbonated beverages, milk, juice, and other related products.
Lease Draft #4 (final) - Church's Chicke.exclusive_use: Landlord will not lease premises in the Shopping Centre to any tenant whose principal business is the sale of chicken products (e.g., KFC, Popeyes Chicken, Mary Brown’s Chicken & Taters, Swiss Chalet or Barcelo’s). This does not apply to existing tenants or tenants occupying in excess of 8,000 square feet.
Lease Draft #4 (final) - Church's Chicke.radius_restriction: Tenant is restricted from operating a similar or competing business within three (3) kilometres of the Shopping Centre.

Lease Draft #3 (final) - H. Sran Venture.renewal_options: 2 option(s) to renew for 5 year term(s)
Lease Draft #3 (final) - H. Sran Venture.exclusive_use: Landlord will not lease premises in the Shopping Centre, other than the Premises, to any tenant whose principal business is that of a veterinary clinic/veterinary hospital. This does not apply to existing tenants or tenants occupying in excess of 8,000 square feet of Rentable Area.
Lease Draft #3 (final) - H. Sran Venture.radius_restriction: Tenant is restricted from operating a similar or competing business within three (3) kilometres of the Shopping Centre.
